title: Client launcher
body: So i play on the oce server and whenever i open my launcher it always makes my region as NA and i would have to click on the restart button to chnage my region back to oce and this is very annoying

replies.body:
Hey Mango keeper! I wanted to follow up with you to see if you were still having this issue. 

If you're still finding this to be a problem, try going into the file:
> League of Legends\Config\LeagueClientSettings.yaml

and ensuring that the file says
> globals:
        locale: "en_AU"
        region: "OCE"

and not 
> globals:
        locale: "en_US"
        region: "NA"

Feel free to ping me if your issues persist!

> [{quoted}](name=Mango keeper,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=e6qEzdtc,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-23T22:54:32.734+0000)
>
> So i play on the oce server and whenever i open my launcher it always makes my region as NA and i would have to click on the restart button to chnage my region back to oce and this is very annoying

Hey!

Do you play on multiple servers or just OCE? I am thinking that maybe you play on NA too and that might be why it "remembers" the NA server vice OCE.
